name: Brew Crew
description:
na then, this games reyt good.

Brew Crew is a sick single player Yorkshire game where Old Bettys rushed off her feet in her proper Yorkshire Cafe where she is getting a mad amount of orders for a decent Brew.

Can you keep up wi' orders and keep Bettys customers 'appy before it all kicks off.

INSTRUCTIONS

Keyboard and mouse: 

Move: WASD    Pickup item: Ctrl 

Pad:

Move: Control stick   Pickup item: A

This game was made in 16 hours at the Yorkshire Jam by a team of small developers who had to make a game with a Yorkshire theme.

For more information or to stay up to date with the progress, please follow @Oceanspark2016 on twitter!
